_PAGE_FILTER_FILE_SIZE_ARGUMENTS_UNITS_: The desired unit for the size specification. Possible units are b (Bytes), kb (Kilobytes), mb (Megabytes), gb (Gigabytes), tb (Terabytes), pb (Petabytes), eb (Exabytes), zb (Zettabytes), yb (Yottabytes)
_PAGE_FILTER_FILE_SIZE_ARGUMENTS_SOURCE_: The unit of the original size. Possible units are the same as for units
_PAGE_FILTER_FILE_SIZE_ARGUMENTS_DIGITS_: The number of decimal places in the formatted string
_PAGE_FILTER_FILE_SIZE_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterFileSize converts a size from a source unit (e.g., Bytes) to a target size in a specific unit (e.g., Kilobytes, Megabytes) and returns the result as a formatted string.
